content.rendered:
An epic journey awaits you as you step into the Land of Smiles, Thailand. Covering an area of approximately 513,120 km², this Southeast Asian country is often called a tropical paradise. Surrounded by the Gulf of Thailand and the Andaman Sea, Thailand is home to spellbinding beauty and vibrant culture with such an aura of festivity that it is just hard to resist. Thailand tour packages are your gateway to unlimited fun and amusement for every day unfolds a different story and every night slumbers many memories.

The country has a beautiful coastline that stretches far to 1,660 kilometers, making room for plenty of beaches. Apart from beaches, Thailand also has an alluring cityscape, featuring the hustling city life of Bangkok, Pattaya, Phuket, Krabi, and Koh Samui. From the one with a family to solo travelers and couples, the country has something for everyone. All that is left now is to pack your bags and board a flight to this wonderful country.

FAQs for Thailand Tour Packages

Q. Does Phuket Have An International Airport?

A. Yes, Phuket has an international airport that connects to many destinations globally. Phuket International Airport is 32 km away from the main city of Phuket.

Q. Is Bangkok A Better Option For Shopping As Compared To Pattaya?

A. For those on the lookout for everything upscale and posh should definitely head to Bangkok, since the city has numerous options available when it comes to luxurious shopping.

Q. Is It Compulsory To Drink Bottled Water In Thailand?

A. Even though there is no harm mentioned in drinking tap water, not many people, including locals, drink it. Bottled is the preferred and safer option.

Q. Can Monsoons In Thailand Be Bad?

A. As a natural season cycle, Thailand also has monsoons. They might not particularly be devastating, but they can easily dampen travel plans of any tourist due to unpredictable rains.

Q. Where Can One Go For Snorkeling In Thailand?

A. Ao Mae Yai Bay, Koh Nang Yuan, Aow Leuk, Maya Bay, and Ao Niang Bay are some of the best to go for snorkeling in Thailand.

Q. Which Months Are Considered Best To Visit Phuket?

A. The cool and dry season is considered as the best time to visit Phuket, i.e., during the months of November and March. One can experience pleasant temperatures and no downpours which are best for traveling.

Q. Where To Get The Best Seafood In Krabi?

A. Aonang Buffet, Masala Delight, The Longtail Boat Restaurant, and King Kitchen Restaurant are some of the suggested options to savor seafood in Krabi.
